import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { ArrowDownward, ArrowUpward, CancelOutlined, CheckCircleOutline } from '@material-ui/icons' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { getTotalCustomers, getTotalTeam} from '../reducer'; import { useStateValue } from '../StateProvider'; export default function MainDash({customers, team}) { const [ { users }, dispatch] = useStateValue(); const loadProducts = () => { dispatch({ type: "fetch_products" }) } const loadUsers = async () => { dispatch({ type: "fetch_users" }) } useEffect(() => { loadUsers() loadProducts() }, []) console.log("Customers: ", customers, users) return ( <>
